title: MOOC-Integrated Learning Design for Transitioning to Online Graduate Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Intensive workshop-style training program to support transitioning current practitioners to an online graduate course, incorporating a hybrid learning environment using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners will understand the learning structure of online graduate programs and explain three or more learning strategies.
Learners will be able to practice using two or more digital tools necessary for mathematical problem-solving.
Learners will be able to create a self-directed learning plan and set achievable goals with over 80% execution success.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
